trans-unit.source: 1 16-oz. pkg. firm <MadCap:keyword term="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />tofu, drained and cut into cubes

seg-source.mrk: firm <MadCap:keyword term="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />tofu, drained and cut into cubes

trans-unit.source: ¼ cup plus 2 Tbsp Tamari <MadCap:keyword term="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />Soy Sauce, divided

seg-source.mrk: ¼ cup plus 2 Tbsp Tamari <MadCap:keyword term="" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />Soy Sauce, divided

trans-unit.source: Cook potatoes and carrots in large pot of boiling salted water 10 minutes, or until just tender. Drain, and set aside.

seg-source.mrk: Cook potatoes and carrots in large pot of boiling salted water 10 minutes, or until just tender.

trans-unit.source: Heat 1 Tbs. oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add tofu, and cook 5 minutes, or until tofu begins to brown. Stir in 2 Tbs. tamari, 1/4 tsp. granulated garlic, and 1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper, and cook until all liquid has evaporated.

seg-source.mrk: oil in skillet over medium-high heat.
Add tofu, and cook 5 minutes, or until tofu begins to brown.
cayenne pepper, and cook until all liquid has evaporated.

trans-unit.source: Heat 1 Tbs. oil in skillet or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add mushrooms, and cook 2 minutes. Add onion, broccoli, and garlic, and sauté 6 to 7 minutes, or until onions begin to soften.

seg-source.mrk: oil in skillet or Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add onion, broccoli, and garlic, and sauté 6 to 7 minutes, or until onions begin to soften.

trans-unit.source: Push veggies to side of Dutch oven. Add remaining 1 Tbs. oil to bottom of pot. Stir flour into oil with fork to make roux; stir until smooth. Stir roux into vegetables.

seg-source.mrk: Push veggies to side of Dutch oven.
Stir flour into oil with fork to make roux; stir until smooth.

trans-unit.source: Stir broth into vegetables. Once gravy is smooth, add tofu, potatoes, carrots, soymilk, remaining 1/4 cup tamari, and wine. Stir gently, then add thyme, sage, hoisin sauce, Worcestershire sauce, remaining 1/4 tsp. granulated garlic, and remaining 1/8 tsp. cayenne. Remove from heat, and set aside, or transfer vegetables to large casserole dish.

seg-source.mrk: Once gravy is smooth, add tofu, potatoes, carrots, soymilk, remaining 1/4 cup tamari, and wine.
Stir gently, then add thyme, sage, hoisin sauce, Worcestershire sauce, remaining 1/4 tsp.
Remove from heat, and set aside, or transfer vegetables to large casserole dish.

trans-unit.source: Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix together flour, salt, and shortening with fork or pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Stir in up to 4 Tbs. cold water, if necessary, for dough to stick together. Gently knead rosemary and sage into dough, and shape dough into ball. Place dough ball in plastic bag, and push out from center of ball to shape dough to size of Dutch oven or casserole dish. Remove dough from bag, and lay over vegetable filling in Dutch oven or casserole dish. Poke holes in dough to allow steam to escape. Bake 45 minutes, or until Crust is golden brown. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

seg-source.mrk: Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix together flour, salt, and shortening with fork or pastry blender until mixture is crumbly.
cold water, if necessary, for dough to stick together.
Gently knead rosemary and sage into dough, and shape dough into ball.
Place dough ball in plastic bag, and push out from center of ball to shape dough to size of Dutch oven or casserole dish.
Remove dough from bag, and lay over vegetable filling in Dutch oven or casserole dish.
Poke holes in dough to allow steam to escape.
Bake 45 minutes, or until Crust is golden brown.

trans-unit.source: We make individual ramekins so everyone has their own. Just divide the dough into several balls before rolling.

seg-source.mrk: We make individual ramekins so everyone has their own.
Just divide the dough into several balls before rolling.

trans-unit.source: Optional: Add chopped Quorn or Turkey to the filling.

seg-source.mrk: Optional: Add chopped Quorn or Turkey to the filling.
